text.section: Any person who has custody of a donated body immediately shall notify the chairman of the Board.
When the Board is notified of the existence of a donated body, the Board may remove the body to a designated morgue in Baltimore City.

section.section: The donated body shall be under the exclusive control of the Board and may be embalmed.
If the body is embalmed, it shall be embalmed in a proper manner by an individual whom the Board designates.
